Attack: Close burst 1 each enemy in the burst Intelligence vs. Reflex

true Hit (AC): 2[W] + Intelligence modifier thunder damage.

true Hit: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier acid damage, or 2d8 + Intelligence modifier acid damage against a target marked by you.

true Effect: You throw your bonded weapon to the origin square. It explodes in flames as part of the attack.

power.title: Shadow Snake Lunge
power.fluff: Like the shadow snake, your strike bites with deadly venom that makes you foe suffer with each movement
power.section: Attack: Melee weapon one creature Intelligence vs. AC and Fortitude
true Hit (AC): 2[W] damage, or 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage if you also hit the target's Fortitude defense.
true If you hit the target's Fortitude defense, you can choose to have the damage be poison damage.
Hit (Fortitude): Intelligence modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus damage if you did not hit the target's AC. You can choose to make this damage poison damage.
Until the end of your next turn, each time the target takes an action to move, it takes poison damage equal to your Intelligence modifier + your weapon's enhancement modifier.
1 Crit: The target takes damage until the end of your next turn or (save ends), whichever lasts longer.

power.title: Sloth Strike
power.fluff: As your blade sinks into the enemy, its blood turns to leaden ice, causing it to stagger heavily
power.section: Attack: Melee weapon one creature Intelligence vs. AC and Reflex
true Hit (AC): 2[W] + Intelligence modifier cold damage.
Hit (Fortitude): The target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
1 Aegis of Assault: While slowed, the first time the target hits with an attack, it takes cold damage equal to 2 + your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.
1 Aegis of Ensnarement: While slowed, the first time the target moves, it takes cold damage equal to your Constitution modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.
1 Aegis of Shielding: While slowed, the target takes a penalty to all damage equal to 2 + one-half your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Transposing Lunge
power.fluff: You thrust at your enemy, a flash engulfs it, and it suddenly appears elsewhere
power.section: Attack: Melee weapon one creature Intelligence vs. AC and Will
You can choose in which order you want to resolve the hits
1 Aegis of Ensnarement: You increase your reach for this power by 1 + one-half your Constitution modifier.

1 Aegis of Shielding: When you use your aegis of shielding class power as an immediate interrupt, you can use this power as part of that action, but the damage is reduced to 1[W] + Intelligence modifier.

true Hit (AC): 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage.
